title: Engines of Empathy
description: Until this morning, Charlotte Pudding was almost happy with her life. Apart from her homicidal toaster, dead parents, and general ennui.  Well, maybe not that happy.  Either way, now that sheâ€™s on the run from a shadowy corporation, seeking the secrets of her own family history and tolerating the inanities of a retired god, things are looking a bit more interesting.
author: Paul Mannering
